trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>evento é gerado quando um botão de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe fornecer um método de processamento de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada sempre que este evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control also raises other events when certain buttons are clicked (for example, buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", or "Page").
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controlo gera também outros eventos quando são clicados determinados botões (por exemplo, botões com o `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Eliminar", "Atualizar" ou "Página").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When you use one of these buttons, you can handle one of the specialized events that are provided by the control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: Quando utiliza um destes botões, pode processar um dos eventos especializados que são fornecidos pelo controlo, tais como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A ListViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Foi transmitido um objeto de ListViewCommandEventArgs para o método de processamento de eventos, que permite-lhe determinar o nome de comando e o argumento do comando do botão que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property, and to determine the command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o nome de comando utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>propriedade e para determinar o argumento do comando, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the button control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode aceder o controlo de botão que originou o evento utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewCommandEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe ListViewCommandEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified source of the command and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando a origem dos argumentos de comando e de eventos especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é principalmente utilizado pelos programadores do controlo quando emitir estes eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object that is contained in the `commandSource` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>que faz a `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>que faz a `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O objeto que está contido no `commandSource` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control for which the command was issued.
trans-unit.target: O item a partir de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controlar para que o comando foi emitido.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade CommandSource para aceder às propriedades do objeto que representa a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> object, the source of the command is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that contains the button clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>objeto, a origem do comando é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controlo que contém o botão clicado pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo processou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: Defina esta propriedade como `true` o processador de eventos para especificar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>controlo não deve processar o evento porque são processamento-lo no seu código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o código de evento vinculados a dados foi ignorado ou foi concluída; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for which the command was issued.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item de dados para o qual o comando foi emitido.

trans-unit.source: The data item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control for which the command was issued.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do item do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> controlar para que o comando foi emitido.
